name: @cypress/schematic
description: Official Cypress schematic for the Angular CLI

scripts.clean12: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox12 && git clean -f -d sandbox12
scripts.clean13: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox13 && git clean -f -d sandbox13
scripts.launch12: yarn link:sandbox12 && cd sandbox12 && ng add @cypress/schematic && cd ..
scripts.launch:test12: yarn link:sandbox12 && cd sandbox12 && ng add @cypress/schematic --e2eUpdate=true && cd ..
scripts.link:sandbox12: yarn link && cd sandbox12 && yarn link @cypress/schematic
scripts.launch13: yarn link:sandbox13 && cd sandbox13 && ng add @cypress/schematic && cd ..
scripts.launch:test13: yarn link:sandbox13 && cd sandbox13 && ng add @cypress/schematic --e2eUpdate=true && cd ..
scripts.link:sandbox13: yarn link && cd sandbox13 && yarn link @cypress/schematic
scripts.unlink:sandbox12: cd sandbox12 && yarn unlink @cypress/schematic && cd .. && yarn unlink
scripts.unlink:sandbox13: cd sandbox12 && yarn unlink @cypress/schematic && cd .. && yarn unlink

author: Cypress DX Team
